ebooks.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
ebooks.author: Yuval Noah Harari
ebooks.description: Sapiens explores how Homo sapiens came to dominate the world, from cognitive revolution to modern capitalism.

ebooks.title: Atomic Habits
ebooks.author: James Clear
ebooks.description: An easy & proven way to build good habits and break bad ones, focusing on tiny daily improvements.

ebooks.title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
ebooks.author: Daniel Kahneman
ebooks.description: Kahneman reveals the two systems that drive the way we think – fast, intuitive thinking, and slow, deliberate thinking.

ebooks.title: The Pragmatic Programmer
ebooks.author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
ebooks.description: A classic book on software engineering and craftsmanship, full of timeless tips and principles for clean code.

ebooks.title: Educated
ebooks.author: Tara Westover
ebooks.description: A memoir about a woman who grows up in a survivalist family and later escapes to pursue higher education.

ebooks.title: The Power of Now
ebooks.author: Eckhart Tolle
ebooks.description: A spiritual guide to help you discover your true self and find peace in the present moment.

ebooks.title: Deep Work
ebooks.author: Cal Newport
ebooks.description: Rules for focused success in a distracted world — how to achieve deep, meaningful work in the age of interruptions.

ebooks.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
ebooks.author: Mark Manson
ebooks.description: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life by embracing struggle and letting go of toxic positivity.

ebooks.title: Can’t Hurt Me
ebooks.author: David Goggins
ebooks.description: A Navy SEAL’s raw autobiography about pushing beyond limits and mastering the mind through pain and challenge.

ebooks.title: Man’s Search for Meaning
ebooks.author: Viktor E. Frankl
ebooks.description: A Holocaust survivor's lessons on finding meaning in life through suffering and purpose.

ebooks.title: Zero to One
ebooks.author: Peter Thiel
ebooks.description: A guide to building innovative startups that create new value rather than compete in existing markets.

ebooks.title: The Lean Startup
ebooks.author: Eric Ries
ebooks.description: A methodology for creating successful startups through rapid experimentation and validated learning.

ebooks.title: Grit
ebooks.author: Angela Duckworth
ebooks.description: The power of passion and perseverance in achieving success, based on psychological research.

ebooks.title: Quiet
ebooks.author: Susan Cain
ebooks.description: A celebration of the strengths of introverts in a world that often favors extroversion.

ebooks.title: Hooked
ebooks.author: Nir Eyal
ebooks.description: A look into how products create habit-forming behavior and how to build products that keep users engaged.

ebooks.title: Drive
ebooks.author: Daniel H. Pink
ebooks.description: Explores what truly motivates people, debunking outdated beliefs about rewards and punishment.

ebooks.title: Start with Why
ebooks.author: Simon Sinek
ebooks.description: Leaders inspire action by clearly communicating their purpose and ‘why’ before the ‘what’ or ‘how’.

ebooks.title: Outliers
ebooks.author: Malcolm Gladwell
ebooks.description: Examines the factors that contribute to high levels of success, including culture, timing, and opportunity.

ebooks.title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
ebooks.author: Stephen R. Covey
ebooks.description: Timeless principles for personal and professional effectiveness and integrity.

ebooks.title: The Alchemist
ebooks.author: Paulo Coelho
ebooks.description: A philosophical novel about a shepherd's journey to fulfill his personal legend.

ebooks.title: Born a Crime
ebooks.author: Trevor Noah
ebooks.description: A memoir of growing up in apartheid South Africa as a mixed-race child, filled with humor and heart.

ebooks.title: Open: An Autobiography
ebooks.author: Andre Agassi
ebooks.description: A candid and compelling memoir by tennis legend Andre Agassi, exploring his career, struggles, and personal growth.

ebooks.title: The Prince
ebooks.author: Niccolò Machiavelli
ebooks.description: A political treatise by Niccolò Machiavelli, offering advice on leadership, power dynamics, and political strategy.

ebooks.title: Meditations
ebooks.author: Marcus Aurelius
ebooks.description: A collection of personal writings by the Roman emperor on Stoic philosophy and self-discipline.

wishlist.title: Meditations
wishlist.author: Marcus Aurelius
wishlist.description: A collection of personal writings by the Roman emperor on Stoic philosophy and self-discipline.

wishlist.title: Drive
wishlist.author: Daniel H. Pink
wishlist.description: Explores what truly motivates people, debunking outdated beliefs about rewards and punishment.

wishlist.title: The Alchemist
wishlist.author: Paulo Coelho
wishlist.description: A philosophical novel about a shepherd's journey to fulfill his personal legend.
